Tamerlan Tsarnaev buried in Doswell, Virginia

Suspect interred in Muslim cemetery

Tsarnaev's remains are at the Al-Barzakh Cemetery, the first Muslim cemetery in central Virginia, according to two sources briefed on the situation. (10:58 a.m.)

The secret transport of Tamerlan Tsarnaev's body was set in motion by a woman who said she was upset about protests and wanted to see an end to the burial saga. (11:53 a.m.)
